EmailTemplate.name: 6/18/2013 - 4.0 Release webinar.Sorry we missed your mailer
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo webinar - sorry to have missed you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We were sorry to have missed you at VMTurbo’s Newest Release Preview Webinar: From Chaos to Control. We had a great discussion about how the latest release of VMTurbo Operations Manager improves performance and reduces infrastructure cost across the virtual datacenter through software-defined control. And although we missed you this time, we are pleased to provide you with a recorded version <http://www.vmturbo.com/operations-manager-webcast-thank-you/> of the webinar.
As part of the recording, you’ll have an opportunity to listen in on the live Q&A from the session. And you will likely have questions of your own, which we will be happy to discuss with you.
Take a look at the attached recording and then let’s grab 15 minutes to chat. We’ll contact you shortly to set up a time.
Sincerely,
The VMTurbo Team
